posts.text: How can anyone call themselves a good person when they sit idly by?
posts.name: Trevally

posts.text: I couldn't live without my phone... and I think that's the problem
posts.name: Trevally

posts.text: Gotta love the cowboys of old, always stood for what was right, no matter what
posts.name: Trevally

posts.text: Although I'd like to believe my statuses inspired some voters
posts.name: Trevally

posts.text: Facebook statuses mean nothing, get out there and vote!
posts.name: Trevally

posts.text: One must always remember to pay attention
posts.name: Trevally
